DisplayForm.Script: <!-- <UiScreen> --> <UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title of 4.xml</Title> <AutoTransition>10</AutoTransition> <!-- --> <Operations> <Op type="Submit"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="./7.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./3.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>IoObject Title 64</Title> <Description>IoObject Description 64</Description> <TextArea id="textarea_id7"> <InitValue>aaaaaa</InitValue> <MinLength>1</MinLength> <MaxLength>7</MaxLength> <Mask>false</Mask> <LetterTypes> <LetterType>UpperCase</LetterType> <LetterType>LowerCase</LetterType> </LetterTypes></TextArea> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
